userStories.title: Add GET /feeds endpoint to relay
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to list all feeds so the viewer can show available feeds.
acceptanceCriteria: GET /feeds returns array of all feeds
Each feed includes id, name, policy_json, created_at
Returns empty array if no feeds exist
Response ordered by created_at descending (newest first)

userStories.title: Add /health endpoint to mirror worker
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the mirror to expose sync status via health endpoint.
acceptanceCriteria: Mirror starts HTTP server on PORT env var (default 3001)
GET /health returns JSON with status, last_commit_sha, last_event_id, last_event_ts
last_commit_sha is most recent commit pushed (null if none)
last_event_id is ID of most recent event written (null if none)

userStories.title: Create viewer-web package scaffold
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the viewer-web package set up with React and Tailwind.
acceptanceCriteria: packages/viewer-web/package.json exists with react, react-dom, vite, tailwindcss
npm run dev starts Vite dev server on port 5173

userStories.title: Create feed list component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see available feeds so I can select one to view.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetches feeds from VITE_RELAY_URL/feeds on mount
Displays each feed as clickable item with name
Shows No feeds available if empty array
Clicking feed calls onSelectFeed prop with feed_id
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create useEventStream hook
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a hook to subscribe to SSE events for a feed.
acceptanceCriteria: events array holds last 100 events (newest first)
Handles connection errors and sets error state
Cleans up EventSource on unmount or feedId change

userStories.title: Create EventCard component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see events as formatted cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Displays ts as relative time (e.g., 2 minutes ago)
Shows payload preview (first 100 chars) with Show more button
Uses Tailwind: rounded border, padding, shadow-sm
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create RawEventView component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see events as raw JSON for debugging.
acceptanceCriteria: Displays full event JSON with JSON.stringify(event, null, 2)
Each event in pre/code block with background color
Scrollable container if content is long
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create ViewToggle component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to toggle between card view and raw JSON view.
acceptanceCriteria: Two buttons/tabs: Cards and Raw JSON
Active view has distinct styling (bg color, border)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create EventList component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see events appear in real-time.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses useEventStream hook with selected feedId
Shows connection status: Connected (green) or Disconnected (red)
Renders EventCard or RawEventView based on viewMode prop
New events appear at top automatically
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create MirrorStatus component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see mirror sync status.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows Mirror offline if fetch fails
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create main App layout
userStories.description: As a user, I want a cohesive layout combining all components.
acceptanceCriteria: App.tsx has header with Switchboard Viewer title
Main area contains ViewToggle and EventList
Shows Select a feed message when no feed selected
Layout uses Tailwind grid or flex
Responsive: sidebar stacks above main on small screens
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add viewer-web to docker-compose
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to run viewer with docker-compose.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses node base image, runs npm run build, serves with nginx or serve
VITE_RELAY_URL and VITE_MIRROR_URL configured for container network
